hero.description: from Rosario, Argentina. +3 years of backend development experience with Python and frontend development skills with React.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: My responsibilities focus on driving the technological transition to AWS cloud services for the client Arcos Dorados. I am actively involved in the development of serverless functions using AWS Lambda and implementing Infrastructure as Code with AWS CDK.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: I was responsible for developing, implementing, and backtesting trading strategies, report generation, creating automatic signal alert systems via email, collecting data for decision-making through scraping, among other tasks.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: I worked as part of a web team, providing solutions to an agricultural company. My responsibilities included Front-end and Back-end development of web applications and incident resolution. I used technologies such as TypeScript, Angular, HTML5, SQL Server, and other .NET tools.

chat-bot.title: Chat-bot
chat-bot.description: Discover my Chat bot! Made with NextJS and Cohere's AI tools. It's a web application that allows interacting with a chat bot answering questions about me.

lookeando.title: Lookeando
lookeando.description: A web application made with React on the front-end and Flask on the back-end. The platform connects users with various beauty services, offering an interactive map and authentic reviews.

gather.title: Gather
gather.description: Final project for my degree. A web application made with Next JS. A carpooling platform that allows finding people to travel with.

repe-app.title: Repe-app
repe-app.description: A web application made with React that allows tracking of your World Cup album stickers. It also offers the possibility to view other users' albums on the platform.

pelibry.title: Pelibry
pelibry.description: A mobile app developed with Flutter. It allows you to note down movies you've watched, rate them, and write reviews. With a username, you can see the movies noted by other users.

stay-home.title: Stay Home
stay-home.description: A mobile game created with Unity. The game was developed entirely from scratch. Unity templates were used for the characters, and some custom designs were created to add a unique touch to the game.

aboutMe.paragraph1: My name is Federico Nav√≥s, and my friends call me Fede. I am 23 years old and from Rosario. I completed my studies as an Information Systems Engineer at the end of 2022.
aboutMe.paragraph2: With skills in Python and React, my specialty is bringing ideas to life through Full Stack development. For me, being a developer goes beyond programming; it's a process of exploration and creation.
aboutMe.paragraph3: Beyond looking to expand my technological stack, I enjoy researching new technologies and how they can impact people's lives. I am excited about the future of artificial intelligence and cryptocurrencies, which has led me to give talks on these topics.
